title: Arrest of Major Cartel Leaders in San Luis Potosi
name: Arrest of Major Cartel Leaders in San Luis Potosi
description: This data details each of the events where major cartel leaders (Plaza level and above) were arrested in San Luis Potosi, Mexico from 09/15/2011 to 12/14/2011.

properties.security operations specs: The specific tactics used were not reported.
properties.event summary: 09/28/2011: On Wednesday, in San Luis Potosi, Mexico, military personnel assigned to the 12th Military Zone in Phase 2 of Operation Escorpion arrested eight people. Among the eight were three unidentified women and Jose Garcia-Cansino AKA Job Reyes-Ledezma aka "El Furcio," the alleged leader of hitmen of Los Zetas, and Juan Gonzalez-Gonzalez aka "El Pollo Loco," in charge of the manufacture and distribution of drugs in San Luis Potosi.
properties.event title: Military Personnel Arrest Eight People in Operation Escorpion
properties.opinfo: Mexican military personnel were involved in the operation.
